_instructions.dates: Multiple dates format (optional): ['So, 31.05.26, 17:00', 'Sa, 30.06.26, 17:00'] - Use this for events with multiple dates instead of 'date'
_instructions.description: Event description (required) - Use \n\n for paragraph breaks
_instructions.footer: Footer info (required) - Usually pricing and registration info
